metadata.title: CVE-2019-16335 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A Polymorphic Typing issue was discovered in FasterXML jackson-databindbefore 2.9.10. It is related to com.zaxxer.hikari.HikariDataSource. This isa different vulnerability than CVE-2019-14540.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-16335` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libjackson2-databind-java - 2.4.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: jackson-databind package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.4.2-3ubuntu0.1~esm2').
